itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, June 24, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, June 24, 2013
byline: Christopher Werth, Scott Tong, Sally Herships, Rob Schmitz, Sam Beard, Bruce Johnson, Chester Wisniewski, Katie Long, David Brancaccio and Jeff Tyler
teaser: A new study shows Southwest states -- New Mexico, Arizona, Nevada -- rank the lowest when it comes to child well-being. Markets in China continue their plunge, but the Chinese government says that's ok. And you've heard of shrinking airplane legroom, but what about shrinking armroom?
description: A new study shows Southwest states -- New Mexico, Arizona, Nevada -- rank the lowest when it comes to child well-being. Markets in China continue their plunge, but the Chinese government says that's ok. And you've heard of shrinking airplane legroom, but what about shrinking armroom?
